page.title: 13LEISURE TIME
page.content:
My name is Ben Bell. This is what I do on Saturday. I get out of bed and go downstairs and turn on the T.V.and watch"Wide-Awake" and the cartoons.Then I go out to play on my bike.After a while I come in and have my lunch then I go out and play with Steven.We play with the Starwars Men.After we have played with the Starwars Men we go fishing down at the falls.We catch small trout.We watch more T.V.before we go to bed.
My name is Zoe Thomas.I am 9 years old.I live in Auchtertyre. After school I play with my friends.Sometimes I go to the shop in Reraig.I play on my bike and I watch films and play games.I feed my dog Cindy.I groom her and shake out her bed.I go to Brownies in the Church Hall.
